attributes.action: Change or redesign the union jack to involve the Welsh Dragon or St David's Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is created to ask the PM to change or redesign the Union Jack, every country in the UK except Wales has a feature of their national flag incorporated into the Union Jack and many people in Wales find this unfair and feel excluded from the Union Jack and unrecognized as a country because of this.

Please change or redesign the Union Jack!
